Summarize the following essay, with the main points All creatures on Earth suffer. Pain is an unavoidable part of life, no matter what form or species. Whether it’s a human’s judgmental scowl or the lion’s injured paw, suffering can be found in the most unlikely places. But why must this be? 

Some deny this reality, instead claiming that the whole universe is a random accident. But nature’s grand design points towards a Supreme Being. This is evident in the intricate details of every ecosystem and how every organism is designed for its role.
